## Pre-Merge Checklist
<!-- IMPORTANT: Complete all items before requesting review -->
- [ ] **Version incremented** in `manifest.json` (use [semantic versioning](https://semver.org/))
- [ ] **CHANGELOG.md updated** with changes in this PR
- [ ] Code follows project style and conventions
- [ ] All test files verified to work (`tests/*.html`)
- [ ] No console errors or warnings
- [ ] Colors verified to be WCAG AA compliant (if color changes)
- [ ] Extension tested by loading unpacked in Chrome
